quote: Never give up work. Work gives you meaning and purpose and life is empty without it. – Stephen Hawking
fact: The ant always falls over on its right side when intoxicated.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke:
I finally bought the limited edition Thesaurus that I've always wanted. When I opened it, all the pages were blank.
I have no words to describe how angry I am.
